tool_description: Analyzes a list of courses to identify time conflicts and overlapping class schedules.

course_ids.description: List of course IDs to check for conflicts

include_travel_time.description: Whether to account for travel time between different buildings

error_messages: Invalid course IDs: One or more courses not found in schedule database
Insufficient courses: Provide at least 2 courses to check conflicts
Schedule data unavailable: Course schedule information not available for one or more courses
usage: Provide a list of course IDs and optionally enable travel time consideration to identify scheduling conflicts.

has_conflicts.description: Whether any time conflicts were found

conflict_details.description: Description of each conflict (times, days, locations)
